serverCallback.developerComment: Standard listing action to retrieve the list of children for a given directory. For the main parameters, use {nodes} parameter, the {dir}+{file} are kept for backward compatibility.

input_param.description: Directory to browse, from the repository root
input_param.name: dir

input_param.description: One file to check
input_param.name: file

input_param.description: One folder to list or one or more files to check
input_param.name: nodes

input_param.description: Details to send back
input_param.name: options

input_param.description: Recursively list all folders
input_param.name: recursive

input_param.description: If recursive listing, maximum depth
input_param.name: max_depth

input_param.description: If recursive listing, maximum number of nodes gathered (soft limit)
input_param.name: max_nodes

input_param.description: Trigger remote order
input_param.name: remote_order

input_param.description: Remote order column
input_param.name: order_column

input_param.description: Remote order direction
input_param.name: order_direction

processing.clientForm:
AJXP_MESSAGE[173]
AJXP_MESSAGE[518]

serverCallback.developerComment: Creates a directory with name {dirname} at the given location.

input_param.description: Folder parent
input_param.name: dir

input_param.description: Folder name
input_param.name: dirname

processing.clientForm: AJXP_MESSAGE[174]

serverCallback.developerComment: Creates a file at the given path. Optionally sets a content.

input_param.description: New file path
input_param.name: node

serverCallback.developerComment: Post a file content for upload, by default as x-www-form-urlencoded, but can be passed as input stream as well.

input_param.description: Target path in the workspace of the file to upload
input_param.name: node

input_param.description: Flag that the file content is passed via the php://input stream instead of standard $_FILES data
input_param.name: input_upload

input_param.description: Automatically detect if there is an existing file with that name, and add a number suffix to the new file.
input_param.name: auto_rename

input_param.description: Recommanded way of passing the filename
input_param.name: urlencoded_filename

input_param.description: An existing file to which we want to append some data. Handy for chunking upload into pieces.
input_param.name: appendto_urlencoded_part

processing.clientForm: AJXP_MESSAGE[119]

serverCallback.developerComment: Download one or many files at once. If multiple files (or a folder path) passed, they are sent back as an archive.

input_param.description: User selection
input_param.name: nodes

processing.clientForm: AJXP_MESSAGE[315]

serverCallback.developerComment: Compress one or many files into a Zip archive. May be disabled for remote-access workspaces (like FTP).

input_param.description: User selection
input_param.name: nodes

input_param.description: Force new archive name. If not set, the parent folder name is used
input_param.name: archive_name

input_param.description: Skip the original folder structure and store all files at the root of the archive
input_param.name: compress_flat

processing.clientForm: AJXP_MESSAGE[296]

serverCallback.developerComment: Returns an fstat() structure

input_param.description: One or more nodes to stat.
input_param.name: nodes

serverCallback.developerComment: For externally modified files, triggers the node.change event in the platform

input_param.description: Original path of the node, or empty if it's a creation
input_param.name: from

input_param.description: Target path of the node, or empty if it's a deletion
input_param.name: to

input_param.description: If {from} and {to} are set, specify whether it's a copy (true) or a move.
input_param.name: copy

serverCallback.developerComment: Applies a node.before_create or node.before_change event to check for exemple that an upload is authorized before posting actual upload.

input_param.description: Hook name, can be before_create, before_change, before_path_change
input_param.name: hook_node

input_param.description: Path of the node
input_param.name: node

serverCallback.developerComment: Alternative to Download, without attachment headers but more in a stream-like format, depending on file type (image, audio, video, plain text).

input_param.description: Path of the node
input_param.name: node

serverCallback.developerComment: PUT the content inside a file, directly from the POST array.

input_param.description: Path of the node
input_param.name: node

input_param.description: Raw content of the file, or base64-encoded if {encode} is set to true.
input_param.name: content

input_param.description: Whether the content is raw or must be base64-decoded before saving. Value can be base64 or empty.
input_param.name: encode

serverCallback.developerComment: For an item located inside the recycle bin, tries to find its original location and move it there.

input_param.description: Path of the node inside the recycle bin
input_param.name: node

serverCallback.developerComment: Rename a resource, file or folder.

input_param.description: Full path to the resource that will be renamed
input_param.name: file

input_param.description: New basename of the resource, in that case the new fullname will be the parent folder of source plus this filename_new.
input_param.name: filename_new

input_param.description: Full path to the new resource. Can be used instead of filename_new parameter.
input_param.name: dest

processing.clientForm: AJXP_MESSAGE[175]

serverCallback.developerComment: Copy one or more items to a given target

input_param.description: Target folder where to copy
input_param.name: dest

serverCallback.developerComment: Move a resource at a given target

input_param.description: Target folder where to copy
input_param.name: dest

input_param.description: Instead of using the underlying PHP move operation, do a copy/delete operation for more safety.
input_param.name: force_copy_delete

serverCallback.developerComment: Delete one or more resources. If the workspace supports Recycle Bin features, resource is actually moved to the recycle bin.
Change the FS permissions of the selected item.

input_param.description: Selected node
input_param.name: node

input_param.description: Chmod value
input_param.name: chmod_value

input_param.description: If the selected item is a folder, whether the chmod should be applied recursively to the folder content.
input_param.name: recursive

input_param.description: If recursive, apply only to files or folders
input_param.name: recur_apply_to

serverCallback.developerComment: Use the filesize of the file to generate an list of pieces to be downloaded using {download_chunk} action. Will generate a unique file_id to be used later.

input_param.description: Selected node
input_param.name: node

input_param.description: Number of pieces to create for the file
input_param.name: chunk_count

processing.clientForm: AJXP_MESSAGE[119]

serverCallback.developerComment: Chunk file into pieces before downloading the pieces. Can be handy for problematic and limited servers.

input_param.description: Unique key generated during the {prepare_chunk_dl} action.
input_param.name: file_id

input_param.description: Position of the file to download
input_param.name: chunk_index

serverCallback.developerComment: If the workspace has a PURGE configured parameter, finds the expired files and delete them. Can be typically called from command line.
